title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-2.2 - Certified boiler inspectors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-2.2 - Certified boiler inspectors

State Regulations
A person shall be a certified boiler inspector whose
competence has been certified by the commissioner and who lawfully possesses a
valid certificate of competence as such issued by the
commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-2.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
